mapper.select: SELECT a.id, b.NAME, b.head_portrait, a.notice_type, a.notice_content, a.object_id, a.publish_time, c.issue_desc FROM common_notice a LEFT JOIN common_user b ON a.publish_user_id = b.id LEFT JOIN spec_issue c ON a.object_id = c.id WHERE CONCAT(',',notice_receiver,',') LIKE CONCAT( CONCAT( '%', #{user_id} ), '%' ) AND notice_type = '3' and STATUS = '1' and state = '1'
